Title: The Way Out
Writer: Diana Gabaldon (based on the series of books written by), Ronald D. Moore (developed by), Anne Kenney (written for television by)
Actors: Caitriona Balfe, Sam Heughan, Tobias Menzies, Gary Lewis
Plot: Claire's abilities as a healer puts her at odds with the town priest when she saves a boy's life, and deepens the suspicions against her. Hearing a folk-tale, Claire realizes that she may be able to travel back through the stones to Frank.
